title: Head of Risk Department

education.name: Samara State Technical Univercity
education.faculty, speciality: Automation and Information Technology Faculty, an engineer programmer

experience.description:
Launching of b2b products:
- Risk Management Systems implementation and support (Risk set up, Risk-making desicion, risk management in credits, operations, liquidity, legal)
- IFRS-9 implementation: Provisions
- Collection Systems implementation (Retail): processes with cost optimization, KPI, funtional-roles modeling
- Research and Development (in AI products): solutions' researching with the customer

- Risk management system implementation (4 basic components)
- Projects planning and its investment pitch preparing
- The leading of the Underwriting and Collections processes: methodology, organization, KPI
- Credit Conveyor (BPMN) implementation
- Data-science researching (score-modeling, margin-modeling, market-targeting models' creation)

Scoring implementation (decision-making systems) and checking the methodology
Base Risk System implementation (credit and operation components)
IFRS-9: provision methodology
Retail and SME-products development: scoring, pre-approval offers, guarranties, life-time value
Underwritting service and Soft-Collection centralization

There are 3 unit in the Department:
Operations: control, monitor and identify risks in the credit business (credit deal with an organizations, clients, banks)
Methodology, Data Centre, Technology: development and Implementation actual/modern methods in the risk-management and standard procedures of credit and invest-processes 
Economics and Finances: management of key indicators of capital,  liquidity, assets and liabilities, bank's profit

An implementation of the banks' business-processes tree, incl. the documentation preparing
An implementation of the project-portfolio management system, monitoring and analysis of the bank projects
Participation in ABS-implementation as a team of business-analysts

Risk-Management:
- Development and implementation of the decision-making system
- Development of the model for the products' profitability calculation
- Development of the model for the companies' profitability and default calculation
- Scorecard and income system implementation
- Implementation and support of provision calculations' and prediction methods 
- Methodology and reporting of collector activity, supporting KPI and motivation system

Reporting:
-Implementation and support the reporting system of risk indicators
-Preparing analysis reports and presentation about the bank activity (production indicators, risk indicators, acceptance rate and rejection reasons)
-Databases Update, OLAP-cubes constructions (MS SQL Server, Analysis Service 2008)

Project management:
- Software development for credit-process optimization
- Upgrade IT-platform with new features and sets
- Employees couching and management
- Management of Projects' Portfolio
- Methodology supporting
- BCH and outsourcers' coordination
- Development of Balanced Scorecard System (KPI and motivation indicators)
